entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is described as a child who was rescued from his parents' house after they were killed by You-Know-Who. He has a great slash across his forehead.

entities.name: lily
entities.description: Lily is described as Harry's mother who was killed by You-Know-Who along with her husband James.

entities.name: james
entities.description: James is described as Harry's father who was killed by You-Know-Who along with his wife Lily.

entities.name: sirius black
entities.description: Sirius Black is described as a friend of Harry's parents and the Secret-Keeper. He arrives on a motorbike and tries to take Harry from Hagrid.

entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: Hagrid is described as a gamekeeper who rescues Harry from his parents' house and refuses to give him to Sirius Black.

entities.name: professor mcgonagall
entities.description: Professor McGonagall is described as a teacher who tries to calm down Hagrid's loud voice.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is described as the headmaster who gives orders to Hagrid about what to do with Harry.

relationships.description: Hagrid and Sirius Black have a conflict when Hagrid refuses to give Harry to Sirius. Sirius tries to take Harry from Hagrid, but Hagrid stands firm.
Hagrid is obedient to Dumbledore's orders and refuses to give Harry to Sirius Black as per Dumbledore's instructions.
